abstract: Google was able to stymie Microsoft’s acquisition of Yahoo without spending any money. But can Google come up with a viable strategy in display advertising as rivals face new pressures to combine?
snippet: Google was able to stymie Microsoft’s acquisition of Yahoo without spending any money. But can Google come up with a viable strategy in display advertising as rivals face new pressures to combine?
lead_paragraph: This post is the second in a short series looking at the defining moments in the technology world in 2008 and posing some crucial questions for 2009.
